creditline: Gift of the Charles Bolles Rogers Family: Frederick Van Dusen Rogers, Nancy Rogers Pierson, Mary Rogers Savage
description: porringer, open work handle; monogram engraving in center
inscription:
Mark and Inscription

Later initals [MCS] in monogram, Scottish style.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside, maker\'s mark illegible.  Lion passant on underside of handle, double-struck, overstriking maker\'s mark.
title: Porringer
